name: Atmosphere
abilities: [{"description":"If your engaged Creature has Invisibility, deal 5 damage.","effectType":"damage","battleRules":{"type":"conditional_damage","notes":"Causa 5 de dano se a criatura engajada tiver Invisibility.","payload":{"condition":"has_keyword","keyword":"invisibility","amount":5}},"targetScope":"opposing_creature"}]

name: Before the Storm
abilities: [{"description":"Air: This counts as your first attack.","effectType":"special","battleRules":{"type":"set_as_first_attack","notes":"Este ataque conta como o primeiro do combate.","payload":{"element":"air"}},"targetScope":"self"}]

name: Clean Slide
abilities: [{"description":"If the opposing engaged Creature has Earth, damage dealt by Clean Slide is reduced to 0.","effectType":"protection","battleRules":{"type":"negate_damage_if_opponent_has_element","notes":"Nega o dano se o oponente tiver o elemento Terra.","payload":{"element":"earth"}},"targetScope":"self"}]

name: Combustion Carnage
abilities: [{"description":"Fire: You may sacrifice an unengaged Creature you control. If you do, deal 20 damage.","effectType":"damage","battleRules":{"type":"sacrifice_for_damage","notes":"Permite sacrificar uma criatura desengajada para causar 20 de dano.","payload":{"element":"fire","amount":20}},"targetScope":"opposing_creature"}]

name: Dry Touch
abilities: [{"description":"Fire: The opposing engaged Creature loses Water.","effectType":"special","battleRules":{"type":"remove_element","notes":"Remove o elemento Água do oponente.","payload":{"element_to_remove":"water","condition_element":"fire"}},"targetScope":"opposing_creature"}]

name: Dust Strike
abilities: [{"description":"Stat Check Speed 60: Deal 5 damage.","effectType":"damage","battleRules":{"type":"stat_check_for_damage","notes":"Realiza um teste de Velocidade para causar 5 de dano.","payload":{"stat":"speed","check_value":60,"amount":5}},"targetScope":"opposing_creature"}]

name: Earthshape
abilities: [{"description":"Your engaged Creature gains Earth until the end of combat.","effectType":"gain","battleRules":{"type":"gain_element","notes":"A criatura engajada ganha o elemento Terra.","payload":{"element":"earth","duration":"end_of_combat"}},"targetScope":"own_creature"}]

name: Eidolon Advance
abilities: [{"description":"Deal 5 damage if your engaged Creature has one or more Mugic counters.","effectType":"damage","battleRules":{"type":"conditional_damage","notes":"Causa 5 de dano se a criatura tiver contadores de Mugic.","payload":{"condition":"has_mugic_counters","amount":5}},"targetScope":"opposing_creature"}]

name: Broding Blast
abilities: [{"description":"Air: The opposing engaged Creature loses Earth.","effectType":"special","battleRules":{"type":"remove_element","notes":"Remove o elemento Terra do oponente.","payload":{"element_to_remove":"earth","condition_element":"air"}},"targetScope":"opposing_creature"}]

name: Extinguishing Fountain
abilities: [{"description":"The opposing engaged Creature loses Fire.","effectType":"special","battleRules":{"type":"remove_element","notes":"Remove o elemento Fogo do oponente.","payload":{"element_to_remove":"fire"}},"targetScope":"opposing_creature"}]

name: Piperam
abilities: [{"description":"Stat Check Power 60: Deal 10 damage.","effectType":"damage","battleRules":{"type":"stat_check_for_damage","notes":"Realiza um teste de Poder para causar 10 de dano.","payload":{"stat":"power","check_value":60,"amount":10}},"targetScope":"opposing_creature"}]

name: Flame Fright
abilities: [{"description":"Engaged Creatures with less than 50 Wisdom or Courage lose a Mugic counter.","effectType":"special","battleRules":{"type":"lose_mugic_counter_if_stat_low","notes":"Criaturas engajadas com Sabedoria ou Coragem baixa perdem um contador de Mugic.","payload":{"stat1":"wisdom","stat2":"courage","check_value":50}},"targetScope":"engaged_creatures"}]

name: Gladiator's Fire
abilities: [{"description":"If your engaged Creature has Recklessness, deal 5 damage.","effectType":"damage","battleRules":{"type":"conditional_damage","notes":"Causa 5 de dano se a criatura engajada tiver Recklessness.","payload":{"condition":"has_keyword","keyword":"recklessness","amount":5}},"targetScope":"opposing_creature"}]

name: Grounding Grapple
abilities: [{"description":"Earth: Look at the top three cards of your Location Deck and put them back in any order. You may reveal a new active Location.","effectType":"special","battleRules":{"type":"scry_and_reveal_location","notes":"Olha o topo do deck de Local e pode revelar um novo.","payload":{"card_count":3,"element":"earth"}},"targetScope":"own_player"}]

name: Incessant Wave
abilities: [{"description":"Stat Check Courage 60: Deal 5 damage.","effectType":"damage","battleRules":{"type":"stat_check_for_damage","notes":"Realiza um teste de Coragem para causar 5 de dano.","payload":{"stat":"courage","check_value":60,"amount":5}},"targetScope":"opposing_creature"}]

name: Magma Might
abilities: [{"description":"Fire: Destroy the opposing engaged Creature's Battlegear.","effectType":"special","battleRules":{"type":"destroy_battlegear","notes":"Destrói o Battlegear do oponente.","payload":{"element":"fire"}},"targetScope":"opposing_creature"}]

name: Meditative Leap
abilities: [{"description":"Stat Check Wisdom 100: Remove a Mugic counter from a Creature you control. If you do, put a Mugic counter on your engaged Creature.","effectType":"special","battleRules":{"type":"stat_check_move_mugic_counter","notes":"Teste de Sabedoria para mover um contador de Mugic.","payload":{"stat":"wisdom","check_value":100}}},{"description":"Stat Check Speed 100: Draw an Attack Card and discard an Attack Card.","effectType":"special","battleRules":{"type":"stat_check_draw_discard","notes":"Teste de Velocidade para comprar e descartar uma carta de ataque.","payload":{"stat":"speed","check_value":100}}}]
